page.title: 09Clubs-Bolton by Bowland
page.content: {The Mother and Toddler group}are a club which meet on Monday afternoons in the school hall.They have toys to play with,they can paint and make things.They enjoy each other's company and so do their mothers. {The Drama Group}put on two yearly performances.They do a concert in the Spring and a play in the Autumn.They have a lot of members. {The Bolland Gardening Club}meet monthly at different gardens in the area.They also go to gardening shows. In the Autumn they hold an exhibition of their produce.
